colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I TSOGS ZHING PHRI TSUL SNANG BRNYAN RAB GSAL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LHA BZO BA DGE SLONG CHOS GRAGS DANG, LHA BZO BA DGE SLONG CHOS GRAGS DANG, LHA BZO BA DGE SLONG SANGS RGYAS SKYABS DANG, ,LHA BZO BA BTZUG TOR RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL ZHING, RANG NYID KYIS KYANG GOS MTHO DMAN GYI MKHAS BLUN GYI SHAN 'BYED PA'I DUS NGAN 'DIR BDAG 'DRA'I YIG 'JOG GIS BSTAN PA LA PHAN THOGS DKA' NA'ANG 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PAR 'GYUR BA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM DU RE BA'I BSAM PAS KUN NAS BSLANG STE, SPRANGS BTZUN YE SHES RNAM RGYAL GYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS BSTAN PA'I RGYUN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
